AcceptLanguage.description: The language code to use for this operation. Supported language codes are as follows: 'en' (English) 'jp' (Japanese) 'zh' (Chinese) If no code is specified, 'en' is used as the default.

AddTags.description: Tags to add to the existing list of tags associated with the product.

Description.description: The updated text description of the product.

Distributor.description: The updated distributor of the product.

Id.description: The identifier of the product for the update request.

Owner.description: The updated owner of the product.

RemoveTags.description: Tags to remove from the existing list of tags associated with the product.

SupportDescription.description: The updated support description for the product.

SupportEmail.description: The updated support email for the product.

SupportUrl.description: The updated support URL for the product.
